Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance.'
Octopuses have three hearts, and two stop beating when they swim.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped to mark their territory.
Honey never spoils; archaeologists have found pots of edible honey in ancient Egyptian tombs.
Sharks existed before trees, appearing around 400 million years ago.
